name: chunky ribbed cowl
notes:
keep the cold wind out with this easy, cozy, cowl pattern. 
the chunky ribbing is made using half double crochet stitches worked in the back loop to create a warm and stretchy cowl. both sides look the same so you can wear it folded it over or full height over your chin for those really cold days.

**skill level:** easy

this pattern is written using us crochet terminology.

**recommended yarn** 
super chunky/bulky #5 or 6 weight (check gauge) in acrylic/wool/blend yarn approximately 85.5 yards/ 78.2m (3oz/85g)

**hooks & other materials** 
•	us size m (9.0mm)
•	yarn needle
•	stitch marker
•	scissors

**sizes/finished measurements** 
approx. 10” x 7” (25.5 cm x 17.8cm) 

this pattern has been tested for errors, but should you have any problems, please send me a message through ravelry
